front.title: Uniform laws and regulations in the areas of legal metrology and engine fuel quality (HB 130 2017 ed)

author.organization: Physical Measurement Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.))

front.abstract: This handbook compiles uniform laws and regulations developed by the Committee on Laws and Regulations of the National Conference on Weights and Measures (NCWM). This edition contains amendments adopted by the NCWM at its Annul Meeting in 2016. The NCWM recommends adoption and promulgation by the states of these Uniform Laws and Relations as updated in this handbook.
